Suitcase as a bookshelf: You can attach a suitcase to the wall and use it as a bookshelf for your favorite books or as a display for decorative items.
Suitcase as a storage unit: If you have limited storage space, you can use a suitcase as a temporary storage solution for seasonal items, such as clothing or bedding.

Suitcase as a coffee table: You can attach a suitcase to the wall and use it as a coffee table with a tray on top. This adds a unique touch to your living room and repurposes an item that would otherwise be unused.
Suitcase as a storage for toys: If you have children, you can use a suitcase as a storage unit for their toys. This keeps their toys organized and makes it easy to transport them when needed.
Suitcase as a pet bed: You can use a suitcase as a cozy bed for your pet. This adds a touch of comfort and warmth to their sleeping area and repurposes an item that would otherwise be unused.
